Efficient support to software in production, developed in Visual Basic and C#, ensuring its stability and performance.

work experience.title:
Systems Engineer, Projects and Engineering Alefer.

work experience.profile: In my role as Specialized Technical Support for the client Development Bank of Latin America (CAF) at Alefer, I developed key skills and achieved significant results:

taks.title: Design of Technical Solutions:
taks.task:
I actively participated in the design of technical solutions for clients, developing skills in the development of detailed technical documentation. 
 I delivered customized solutions that aligned with the specific needs of the clients.

taks.title: Troubleshooting and Incident Response:
taks.task: I attended and resolved incidents on a daily basis, developing solid problem solving skills and effectively managing time to ensure customer satisfaction.

taks.title: Documentation and Recording of Procedures:
taks.task:
I documented area procedures to maintain a clear and organized record of activities performed. 
 I ensured the consistency and quality of team work by providing a structured and transparent framework for operations.

taks.title: Implementation and Configuration of Devices and Equipment:
taks.task: I was responsible for the implementation, installation and configuration of devices and equipment, developing technical skills in the handling of tools and technologies in both hardware and software.

work experience.commitment: These experiences strengthened my ability to address technical challenges, manage projects effectively and ensure excellence in customer service.
